text: Pavel Kantor (born August 17, 1991) is a Czech professional ice hockey goaltender. He is currently playing for Czech Extraliga side HC Dynamo Pardubice.https://www.hcdynamo.cz/clanek.asp?id=Pavel-Kantor-bude-v-Dynamu- pokracovat-i-v-dalsim-rocniku-10796 Kantor previously spent a short stint in 2019 with Elite Ice Hockey League (EIHL) side Sheffield Steelers.https://sheffieldsteelers.co.uk/its-czechs-mate-for-the-steelers/ Kantor also previously iced for BK Mlada Boleslav of the Czech Extraliga. Kantor made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with Motor České Budějovice during the 2011-12 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Czech ice hockey goaltenders Category:SK Horácká Slavia Třebíč players Category:Motor České Budějovice players Category:LHK Jestřábi Prostějov players Category:HC Oceláři Třinec players Category:Sportspeople from České Budějovice Category:IHC Písek players Category:Sportovní Klub Kadaň players Category:Stadion Hradec Králové players Category:HC Vítkovice players Category:Sheffield Steelers players Category:HC Dynamo Pardubice players
title: Pavel Kantor
